text: license agreement jbossr this license agreement governs the use of the software packages and any updates to the software packages regardless of the delivery mechanism

red hats entire liability and clients exclusive remedies shall be if the software media is defective client may return it within 30 days of delivery along with a copy of clients payment receipt and red hat at its option will replace it or refund the money paid by client for the software
